title: Catastrophic Tool Failure: Unable to Revert Files
description: The AI assistant is unable to revert files to a previous state using the edit_file tool. The model consistently returns 'no changes' even when provided with new content. This makes it impossible to recover from a bad state and has completely blocked all debugging efforts.
steps: Make a change to a file.
Attempt to revert the change by providing the original content to the edit_file tool.
Observe that the model does not apply the change.
comment: Was unable to reproduce the file revert issue with a test case. The edit_file tool appears to be working correctly now. Closing this ticket. Will reopen if the issue resurfaces.
